name: Conditionary
description:
Your task is to convert an array of numbers into a string of 1's and 0's based on a series of conditionals. If a number on either side of any value in the array is the same as the value, return 1 for that value, otherwise return 0. If array is empty, return 0.

## Input
```
conditionary([1, 2, 2, 3, 4, 4, 4, 5, 6])
conditionary([4, 2, 2, 4])
conditionary([])
```

## Output
```
// -> "011011100"
// -> "0110"
// -> "0"
```

The input array may contain numeric strings and integers.
